field.label: Enabled
field.help: Enable this pipe and it's related queues and rules

field.label: Queue
field.help: Number of dynamic queues, leave empty for default

field.label: Mask
field.help:
Dynamic queue creation by source or destination address.
  • choose destination here to share the total bandwidth of this pipe among all connected clients.
  • choose source to provide all connected clients up to a maximum of this pipe configured bandwidth

field.label: Scheduler Type
field.help: Specify the scheduling algorithm to use

field.label: (FQ-)CoDel Target
field.help: Minimum acceptable persistent queue delay (in ms), leave empty for default

field.label: (FQ-)CoDel Interval
field.help: Interval before dropping packets (in ms), leave empty for default

field.label: FQ-CoDel Quantum
field.help: The number of bytes a queue can serve before being moved to the tail of old queues list (bytes), leave empty for defaults

field.label: FQ-CoDel Limit
field.help: The hard size limit of all queues managed by this instance, leave empty for defaults

field.label: FQ-CoDel Flows
field.help: The number of flow queues that are created and managed, leave empty for defaults
